title: Sham Trial? Kanye’s New Crew? 1.15.20
itunes:title: Sham Trial? Kanye’s New Crew? 1.15.20
description:
In episode 549, Miles and special guest host Blake Wexler are joined by comedian Chris Crofton to discuss the Senate impeachment trail, Republican Senators considering bucking Trump on war powers, a Murdoch family member defending climate change, Felicity Huffman's daughter booking a tv role, Kanye West joining a MAGA Evangelical crew, the history of Philadelphia Cream Cheese, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. White House expects GOP defections on calling witnesses in Senate impeachment trial
  2. Senate GOP Wary Of Voting To Dismiss Impeachment Case Early In Trial
  3. Up to 10 GOP senators consider bucking Trump on war powers
  4. James Murdoch Slams Fox News and News Corp Over Climate-Change Denial
  5. FELICITY HUFFMAN DAUGHTER LANDS IN 'TWILIGHT ZONE' ... After College Admissions Scandal
  6. Kanye West Joins Dominionist Pro-Trump ‘Prophets’ for Stadium Prayer Rally
  7. How Philadelphia Cream Cheese Took Over the World
  8. WATCH: Africa Express - Johannesburg

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
